name: HARM WIERDA - 777
description:
Really really vague record of this great organ player of the Groningen Mormon church. Think analogue organs and synths, somewhere between Air, Cor Steyn, John Cale, Soft Machine, 16 Horse power, Ween, Philip Glass, David Bowie, Lee Hazelwood, Claire Lynch, All the Children of Jubal, Klaus Schulze, Elvis, Thelonius Monk, with special thanks to the Mormon Tabernacle Choir.

	Like a long fantastic trip…

	Listen to tracks on www.myspace.com/harmwierda

	Price includes shipping worldwide!

name: ADEPT - ADEPT
description: Adept is widely considered as one of the most promising acts at this time from the Netherlands, and most likely to break through in 2008. The Adept sound refers to Liars, Animal Collective, Thom Yorke, The Knife, New Order and Suicide. Yet they are unlike anything you have ever heard before. They combine cold Teutonic beats with loud noise eruptions, with a constant subtle erotic layer underneath. Live, the band is a four piece, with vocals, synths, guitar and cymbals. In 2007 the band released their self-titled debut album on WHAMrecords. It was nominated record of the year by Dutch national radio station 3voor12. Adept did numerous live shows throughout the Netherlands, in Berlin, England and New York. They also performed at the Lowlands Festival (with LCD Sound System, M.I.A., Nine Inch Nails, Interpol and others), Clash Festival (with Mr. Oizo, Jeff Mills, Noisia and others) and Rauw (3 times, with Arthur Baker, Larry Tee, Tommie Sunshine and others). Listen to tracks on www.whamwhamrecords.nl/adept PRICE INCLUDES SHIPPING WORLDWIDE!

name: BONNE APARTE
description:
BONNE APARTE – BONNE APARTE
CD – 10 TRACKS

Overwhelmingly loud chaos rock by six healthy young men with their hearts in the right place. We’ll be darned.
 
The lively scene surrounding Adept has now come up with a smack on the head released on =WHAM!WHAM!= records. Ultra short, extremely fierce songs that leave just enough space for melody. Brutal and gallant at the same time. The boys have pulled off a masterpiece in capturing their harsh live sound in the studio. The result is unprecedented in the Netherlands. Loud, in your face. An international future is ahead for the boys. References: Captain Beefheart, Shellac, Sonic Youth, Millionaire, Adept.

Bonne Aparte was founded in 2006. In 2008 they played on Noorderslag/EuroSonic. In May/June/July 2008 they will play Dutch clubs and festivals to promote their debut album. In September 2008 the band goes to Russia to do some shows, and in October they’re going to New York, US.
